faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about Picmotion.

items.question: What is Picmotion?
items.answer: Picmotion is an AI-powered tool that transforms your photos into cinematic 2-minute portrait vlogs. Just upload your photos and our AI does the rest — no editing skills, no prompts, no effort required.

items.question: What kind of photos can I use?
items.answer: Any photo works! Selfies, travel shots, wedding photos, old family pictures, group photos — Picmotion's AI adapts to any style and creates a beautiful vlog from whatever you upload.

items.question: How long does it take to generate a vlog?
items.answer: Most vlogs are ready within 2-3 minutes after uploading your photos. You'll receive a notification when your vlog is ready to download or share.

items.question: Is it really just a slideshow?
items.answer: Not at all. Picmotion creates a real vlog with cinematic transitions, story flow, music, and professional-grade motion effects. It looks like it was produced by a video editor.

items.question: Can I share my vlog on social media?
items.answer: Yes! You can download your vlog in HD quality or share it directly to Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, and other platforms with one click.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept PayPal and all major credit cards. Payment is secure and processed instantly.

items.question: Do you offer refunds?
items.answer: If you're not satisfied with your vlog, contact our support team within 24 hours and we'll work with you to make it right or issue a refund.
